        Adds an appointment to the database.
        Parameters:
        start - The start time and date of the appointment.
        end - The end time and date of the appointment.
        customerId - The customerID for the appointment.
        userId - The userID for with the appointment.
        contactId - The contact id for the appointment.
        title - The title of the appointment.
        description - The description of the appointment.
        location - The location of the appointment.
        type - The type of appointment.
